title: No. 60: Louis-Joseph, Marquis de Montcalm, Lieutenant General des Armees de France, from a recueil of etchings
marks:
Signature

 LRC, in the plate: [A.L. De La Live Sculp.]
description: torso-length portrait of a man inside a cartouche; man wears fur-trimmed coat and powdered wig; name around cartouche, inscription below
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones and John E. Andrus III
artist: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully
